strapiPost.title: Fun and Charity Will Collide on the Dancefloor During the 2023 Mom Prom
strapiPost.content:
Macaroni KID Fayetteville is thrilled to announce the return of Mom Prom to Northwest Arkansas, bringing a night of fun, laughter, and dancing for a great cause to Mount Sequoyah Center in Fayetteville on Sep 16

Ladies Night: Mom Prom began in Michigan in 2006 and has grown into a national movement to get women together for a fun night while supporting local charities. Organized by Macaroni KID Fayetteville, the NWA Mom Prom will raise funds for Peace at Home Family Shelter.

Hit the Dancefloor: Break out your puffy-sleeved prom dresses, wedding gowns, or favorite cocktail dress, and dance the night away. There will be a DJ, food and drinks, swag bags, photo booths, a Prom Queen game, and plenty more surprises.

Mom Prom is for all women, not just moms! Reserve tickets HERE.
